info.name: Fairy Kei Kawaii Pastel Youtube
info.description: A pastel Youtube theme. It's revamped to make everything look neater! background image by twinklechan, youtube logo replacement by unknown Important note! This will only work if you have old youtube turned on and new youtube turned off. How to turn old youtube on: 1. Use the inspect option on Firefox and Chrome (On Chrome, just press Ctrl + Shift + I) 2. Go to the Application tab. 3. Drop down the Cookies menu and click on the youtube link. (https://www.youtube.com) 4. Use the filter search for the word "PREF" 5. Change the Value to al=en&f5=30030&f6=8 (copy and paste) and hit enter. 6. Click on the little refresh icon in the Developer Tools bar and refresh the page. The old youtube layout should return!
info.additionalInfo: Youtube took away the old youtube option without telling anyone. I've added the solution to the problem in the description. Thanks to bensonburner85 on reddit!
